title: Saikin, Uchi no Robot no Yousu ga Okashii
author: Ouchi Kaeru (御家かえる)

title: Kinenbi Manga
author: Pageratta
description: A manga about celebrating all the different holidays a year has.

title: Chicken Wing Diaries
author: Nishinori
description: Yuri, a high school student obsessed with efficiency, gets his hands on a watch that can make time feel twice as fast. What starts with skipping boring classes soon leads to him speeding up his entire life.

title: Isekai Ojisan
author: Hotondo Shindeiru
description: Having survived an isekai for 17 years, 34 year old Ojisan (uncle) returns to modern day Japan. Takafumi, Ojisan's nephew, now gets to witness what throwing a diehard Sega fan into an isekai for 17 years does to various things and people, both past and present.

title: Kakunaru Ue wa
author: Takahata Kyuu
description: Uehara-kun, who loves 2D, dreams of becoming a comic artist one day! However, his dream is threatened when an editor rejects his work as too boring. The next day, while contemplating giving up on his dream, a gal in his class, Miyamoto Niina, sees his manuscript…

title: The Ruler of the Land
author: Jeon Geuk-jin
description:
Bi-Kwang is a handsome young warrior who becomes a drooling mess whenever he sees a pretty girl. Out on the road he meets an extraordinary swordfighter with no name who is searching for a legendary master warrior. Bi-Kwang promises to aid the swordfighter if he lets Bi-Kwang meet his beautiful sister. Of course, it turns out the swordfighter is the sister, Hwa-Rin Dahm, and she must switch identities to keep the plot moving along. Bi-Kwang is immediately smitten, and thus we have a triangle involving only two people.

The story takes place in a setting in each side is trying to unify the Murim as a whole, and while this is taking place, Bi-Kwang who is extremely good at learning martial arts but doesn't want to learn it, gets into a deal where he takes the girl to see her grand father since he was the last person to see him before he disappeared and on the way he encounters many enemies and some friends (who show up from time to time) and he matures since he realizes why martial arts is so important and that he has been using it wrongly. (Source: MAL)

---
**Links:**
- **Original manhwa:** [Korean](http://smart.dwci.co.kr/event/yulgang/yulgang_event.asp)

**Notes:**
- Although there are many chapters listed as missing, nothing is actually missing. The numbering changed a few times, hence why it displays as missing. 
- This manhwa was also made into a MMORPG.

title: Shy
author: Miki Bukimi
description:
In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters.
___
[Official X](https://x.com/SHY_off)

From Yen Press:
Earth was on the brink of a third World War when super-powered individuals came forth from each country around the globe, ending the conflict and ushering in a new era of relative peace. Among those heroes, Japan is represented by a timid young girl known as “Shy.” She may spend more time worrying about her own shortcomings than she does battling villains, but she'll show the world that despite it all she still has the heart of a hero.

title: Tensei Shite Seichou Cheat o Te ni Iretara, Saikyou Skill mo Tsuita no desu ga!?
author: Yama (やま)
description:
High school student Hayato Katsuragi dies in a traffic accident and is reincarnated as Reivelt Runwalker, the son of a noble in another world.

At the time of his reincarnation, the goddess bestows upon him a cheat skill with no level limit, but at the same time, he also acquires the most terrifying skill, “The One Afflicted by Hardship”.

With his life now guaranteed to be in hard mode, Reivelt resolves to undergo training and become stronger.

While receiving his lessons, he enjoys a happy life alongside his cute maid and his little sister, but then they are attacked by a massive horde of monsters all of a sudden!

title: Gakuen Tanmoshi
author: Nigojuu
description:
Finally, school life with Siesta!?

I did it!...But why? The detective is already...

A school romantic comedy that retains the everyday feel of the past, but also has some serious developments for those who have already read the original!!

title: Kao ni Denai Kashiwada-san to Kao ni Deru Oota-kun
author: Azuma Fuyu
description:
Meet Kashiwada-san, a female middle-school student, who remains emotionless regardless of how she is meddled with.  
And Oota-kun, unable to control his facial expressions, is the complete opposite of Kashiwada-san–but he keeps messing with her, against his better judgment?!  
Though the two of them are the exact opposite, will a mutual love eventually develop between them…?

title: Uma Musume - Pretty Derby: Star Blossom
author: Cygames
description:
The popular cross-media content "Uma Musume Pretty Derby" features "Uma Musume" who have inherited the names and souls of numerous racehorses! A new legend begins with the indomitable horse girl "Sakura Laurel" as the main character.
___
- [Alternative Raw](https://shonenjumpplus.com/episode/4856001361118480104)

title: Josou Danshi wa Skirt wo Nugitai!
author: Shinagire
description: Uichiro, a junior high school boy, harbors a secret he cannot share with his childhood friend, Tama-chan. He has been cross-dressing for her because she has a phobia of men. This is a thrilling yet agonizing comedy about a boy who cross-dresses for the girl he loves!

title: Isekai Meikyuu no Saishinbu wo Mezasou
author: Warinai Tarisa
description:
Kanami, a young man that strayed into another world and suddenly awoke in a dark corridor is nearly killed by a demon and humans. Then preferring to use the status and skill systems Kanami aims for the deepest part of the Labyrinth. The skill [? ? ?] consumes his emotions, and he befriends some unusual people, but while his spirit wanes in the other world's Labyrinth he refuses to give up on returning to his original world.  
  
"I'll absolutely save you. Hence I will–!!" Aikawa Kanami awakes in a corridor he has no recollection of, the wound he received from a goblin is cured by a pretty girl called Lastiara, and he learns that he's in a different world that's exceedingly similar to a game. Kanami makes into his weapon the hearty welcomed status and skills, and with a pretty girl Dia plunges forward towards the deepest part of the labyrinth that's rumoured to "grant any wish"–.

title: My Name Is Shingo
author: Kazuo Umezu
description:
Two elementary school pupils, a girl named Marine and a boy named Satoru, fall in love and are blessed with a rather unorthodox child which happens to be a robot. This robot is called Shingo and the story recounts how its mind develops and how it travels the world in pursuit of its ‘parents’ whom it has never had a chance to meet.

Note: Volume count based on the bunkoban.

title: Shitsurenshita node Vtuber Hajimetara Toshiue no Onee-san ni Motemashita
author: Nito Rin
description:
Shocked after Yuki Himemura found out that the club senpai he was crushing on got a boyfriend, he decided to become a VTuber—something both he and his senpai have always liked—and used his savings to assemble his equipment. He gets his virtual character designed only to discover that it's a 3D model of a cute girl and, in the process, unintentionally ends up portraying one! Not only that but the person who designed and rigged his model and his favorite VTubers are starting to take a liking to him...?

(Synopsis via Novel Updates)

title: Kigahayai Daigaku no Kouhai Kanojo
author: Grande
description: This is the story of a busty girlfriend who wears tights and is impatient to get cozy with her senior boyfriend whenever she wants.

title: Bìzuǐ Èlóng Wǒ Bùxiǎng Zài Gēn Nǐ Dài Háizi Le
author: Milkshake tail sauce
description:
After being defeated and captured, the dragon slayer Leon became a captive of the Silver Dragon Queen. With the awareness of death, he used forbidden magic to curse the queen, but unexpectedly, the queen lost control. 

He thought that this would make the queen live with shame for the rest of her life, and it would be worthy of the dragon slayer's mission. 

But two years later, when Leon opened his eyes, next to him was a little dragon girl with a tail...

title: Raitei no Kiseki ~Ore dake Tsukaeru "Kaminari Majutsu" de Isekai Saikyou ni!~
author: Heisei Owari
description:
What I have in my hand is "thunder magic" that only I can use...!

The adventure story of a boy who was reborn as the one and only lightning magician to become the strongest in a different world begins now!

title: Excalibur!
author: Suda Yuriko
description: Princess Asahi, an athletic princess, sets out on a journey with her holy sword (+ guardian spirit) and summoner in search of her abducted fiancé, Prince Junon. However, when they finally found the prince, he had become a woman due to a curse...!!

title: Kochira, Shuumatsu Teitai Iinkai.
author: Enen Kien
description: Kotoyorozu Kotoha, a boy with an underground past as a former mafia underling, had given up on youth. However, his life changes completely after meeting certain girls. With massive guns, they fight against mysterious beings threatening to destroy humanity! This is their school life — full of chaos, action, and unexpected twists. Behind the facade of the world lies a wild and outrageous youth like no other!

title: Kusuriya no Hitorigoto: Maomao no Koukyuu Nazotoki Techou
author: Hyuuga Natsu
description: In the imperial court, a young woman is put into servitude, Maomao. The tale is just beginning for the female apothecary from the red-light district, as rumors circulate about the emperor's children's lives being short-lived. Her curious nature and thirst for knowledge pushes her to action. To satisfy her curiosity, this young apothecary will investigate the origin! What is shifting in the imperial court...!?

title: Koibumi to 13-sai no Actress
author: Jaga
description: Fumi Isshiki works as an accountant at an entertainment agency. One day he is transferred to the management department, where Ayano Haga, a 13-year-old child actress, seems to take a liking to him... She is just a child, yet she acts more mature than many adults.

title: Daigaku Nyuugakuji Kara Uwasa Sareteita Bishoujo San Shimai, Ikiwakareteita Gimai Datta.
author: Natsunomi
description: The three sisters, once clingy and needy as children, have now grown into beautiful young women—and for some reason, they've developed a strong possessive streak!

title: Hajime no Ippo
author: Morikawa George
description:
Makunouchi Ippo is an ordinary high school student in Japan. Since he spends most of his time away from school helping his mother run the family business, he doesn't get to enjoy his younger years like most teenagers. Always a target for bullying at school, Ippo's life is one of hardship. One of these after-school bullying sessions turns Ippo's life around for the better, as he is saved by a boxer named Takamura. He decides to follow in Takamura's footsteps and train to become a boxer, giving his life direction and purpose. Ippo's path to perfecting his pugilistic prowess is just beginning.
___
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Fight!! Ippo** (2006-ongoing)

title: Otonari no Oneesan ni Arekore sareru
author: Sadakiyo Kazuhiko
description: 22 year old Chia regularly stops by the apartment of her neighbor Kento every day. Kento is a third-year junior high school student who is often busy studying for exams. Chia's feminine charms keep tension with him whenever they are together.

title: Yajin Tensei: Karate Survivor in Another World
author: Yazin
description:
When 34-year-old Nozaki Hitoshi is hit by a truck, he is sent to a fantasy world by a dismissive god and dropped into a harsh wilderness without even the clothes on his back. His only salvation is a newly granted karate skill and his general survival instincts. Luckily, Hitoshi is up for the challenge–he'll weave clothes out of tree bark, test fruit for poison, and crawl through the mud to test his kicks and punches against goblins and other creatures. No matter how much he levels up in this world, he still longs to find other humans to share his solitude.

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
___
- [Web Novel Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5771ei/)  
- [Alternate Raw: NicoNico](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/41841)

title: Muboubi Kawaii Pajama Sugata no Bishoujo to Heya de Futarikiri
author: Kanoda Kizu
description:
During summer break, Manamichi, who had been spending his days buried in studies, was tasked with tutoring his classmate, Makura Koiro. When he visited her apartment, where she lived alone, she greeted him in her pajamas and surprised him with an unexpected proposal.

"Hey... let's just indulge together, okay?"

Spending time with Koiro, who remained in her cute pajamas and was full of vulnerabilities, they played games, ate meals, and before he knew it, they were sleeping side by side...

title: Having Fun With the Fox
author: __Ten__
description: She meets a fox and saves it. Later, the fox repaid the favor, and the relationship between the two continued to linger. The word love was originally a floating cloud in the sky for the two of them, but they never expected it to be the word with the strongest connection between the two.

title: Shachiku Kensei, Haishinsha ni Naru: Black Guild Kaishain, Ukkari Kaisha-you Kaisen de S-kyuu Monster o Aite ni Musou Suru Tokoro o Zenkoku Haishin Shiteshimau
author: Kumano Genkotsu
description:
“Getting a job is the grave of life…” sighs Tanaka Makoto, an office worker belonging to a black guild, as he takes on a dungeon for work again today. 

One day, he makes a mistake in the broadcast settings for recording work, and broadcasts his dungeon capture to the whole country. A single blow from the Tyrant Dragon?! Tanaka, a sword master in the modern age, shows off his extraordinary skills, and the broadcast turns into a festival! 

"100 million concurrent viewers…?!"

Tanaka, who unexpectedly becomes an incredibly popular broadcaster, quits his black workplace and becomes an independent broadcaster. 

Now it’s time for work. The former corporate slave’s life of dungeon broadcasting begins!

title: Carneades
author: Ayasato Keishi
description: In this world there are 5 different races: Angels, Demons, Beastkin, Vampires, and Humans. Among them, Elle, an angel boasting immense power, belongs to the Angel Police. Having a strong sense of Justice in her heart, she is strict with both herself and others and diligently carries out her duties. One day, Elle, because she is a member of the Angel Police Elite Force, is ordered to capture the timid demon Eve. Elle ends up chasing Eve who is a bit of a problem child who manages to escape from prison every time she is caught! Moreover, both Eve's ability to swiftly escape and her strong summon beasts make it quite difficult for her to be captured! While she is chasing Eve, she gets caught up in an outrageous incident!!

title: Nani mo Wakaranai
author: 7Liquid
description: What if you lost all your memories and were suddenly thrown into an unfamiliar world? And what if you couldn't understand a word the other person said……? In this new world, with this unknown girl. A survival communication story in a different world, starting from zero knowledge, begins!

title: Musket Girls! ~Tensei Sanbou to Senretsu Otome-tachi~
author: Hyougetsu
description: After my previous life was cut short, I was reincarnated in a world of early modern-style warfare where line infantry exchanges gunfire. Being a commoner second lieutenant, I was shunned as "Krombertz the Grim Reaper" because of the many deaths of my men in battle. With that, I was assigned to the 6th Special Duty Brigade, an all-female unit, as a staff officer. The brigade commander, who is up to something, and the carefree non-commissioned officers are women, while the foot soldiers are just girls who are practically amateurs. In this world, if you don't fight, you will be killed. That being the case, I have to do something about this... but how?!

title: Bartender à Tokyo
author: Joh Araki
description:
(from ebookjapan):

After training in Paris, bartender Ren Sajima returns to Ginza, Tokyo. His first customer, the owner of a long-established kimono shop, tells him that it is bothersome to have a wandering young bartender in Ginza, but...?

title: Haru no Regista
author: Tsuchii
description:
Once hailed as a soccer prodigy, high school girl Arai Haru transferred to a school far from her hometown, hoping to start a new life away from soccer. However, a new student, Osanai Satsuki, who admired Haru's past glory, appeared before her and declared her intention to join the Soccer Club, which is on the verge of disbandment. This is a girls' soccer story about a girl who gave up her dream and a girl who chases after it!
___
**What is a regista?**
The regista is a creative player who operates in front of the defense, almost always in a central position, and looks to get on the ball as often as possible. They are responsible for providing the link between defense and offense, and controlling the tempo of the game through their passing. The regista is also known as the deep-lying playmaker: they retain their deep position and dictate their team's play with their distribution. ([Coaches' Voice](https://www.coachesvoice.com/cv/what-is-a-regista-explained-jorginho-andrea-pirlo/))

title: Okaasan Boukensha, Login Bonus de Skill [Shufu] ni Mezamemashita. Shuuichi Moraeru Chirashi de Boukensha Seikatsu Ganbarimasu!
author: Yuuko
description:
Kachua, a mother of two, works part-time as a porter carrying supplies for adventurers while raising her children. She struggles daily to balance parenting and work, but one day she receives a skill from the goddess—and begins her life as a true adventurer! And her weapons? A ladle and a pot lid!? The newbie mom adventurer begins her laid-back, unstoppable journey! A relaxed and fun adventure tale begins!!
___
**Character Designer:** [Kyouichi](https://mangadex.org/author/08774bec-47fb-4ca4-aefb-ef6a2c2201c6)

title: Wazawai no Avalon ~Game Saijaku no Akuyaku Debu ni Ten'i Shita kedo, Ore dake "Yasereba Tsuyokute New Game" na Sekai datta no de, Saisoku Level Up & Hametsu Flag Kaihi de Kage no Eiyuu wo Mezashimasu~
author: Akito Narusawa
description: The main character loves the MMORPG game called Dungeon Explorer Chronicle (Dun-Ex). During one particular day, a beta test event was announced, and he managed to beat it. In exchange for clearing the event, he was granted permission to try the beta test server. Forcing to choose different avatar and skill as the system doesn't allow his own, he eventually settled on random. However, he is transferred to a place where, as expected, he finds a fat, villainous mob character...!

title: Moriagaranai Date
author: Suzuyuki
description:
A So-So Match on a Dating App…

Haida, cursed with chronic bad luck, signs up for a dating app as part of her “what-the-heck” phase. She matches with Kuroi, a man who joined for equally reckless reasons. But their conversation never quite clicks, and an unmistakably low-key, awkward mood sets in. Everything they do backfires, resulting in a date that is astonishingly unexciting.

Thinking there’s no way there’ll be a second date in an atmosphere like this… wait, what? Why are they making plans to meet again!?

A first date with someone you met on a dating app that just doesn’t take off? The deadpan, surreal banter is way too addictive! A slow-burn, gently unfolding romance that begins with a matching app.

title: Mimi
author: Nhim
description:
Her name is Mimi, she's a completely normal and well adjusted human being.
**This is her story.**

title: The Marshal King
author: Boichi
description:
Nobody on the continent hasn't heard of the evil deeds of the great outlaw M. Godspeed. But one day, a young man claiming to be the criminal's son suddenly appears trekking through the harsh desert. This Jim Godspeed says he's killed his father and has the corpse to prove it!

(Source: MangaPlus)

title: Birds Junkies
author: Sorano Kairi
description: Naruse is a new working adult who is exhausted from his unfamiliar life. He reaches his limit and storms into his neighbor's house! There, he finds "that thing" that even makes Naruse addicted to it. A person who knows Naruse says, "He is addicted to birds more than anything else. The person who is addicted to birds is the worst of all..."

title: You Shou Yan
author: 靴下猫腰子
description:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?

title: Kaijin Reijou
author: Tashiro Tetsuya
description:
Asuma Sudou has always been a proud pervert, but he's sworn to give that up to chase the girl of his dreams. Having received a special invitation to enter the same all-girls school as her, he's planning to live his romantic youth to the fullest. But those plans are cut short when it turns out the school is a front for a secret organization dedicated to battling kaijin-monsters created when people succumb to their murderous impulses! The girls of the school fight using the relics of defeated kaijin, but when the bloodthirsty instincts sealed within threaten to overwhelm them, Asuma is the only one who can bring them back to their senses!

(From: Yen Press)

title: Loser Fox
author: Shanexiaocai
description: This is the life story of a cute and dumb fox.

title: Kinnikuman II-Sei: Ultimate Chojin Tag Arc
author: Yudetamago
description: The sequel series to "Kinnikuman ii sei".     A new threat appears to defeat the Legends, known only as the 'Time Chojin'. These mysterious villains travel through time, in their quest to eradicate the Justice Chojin. If their plan succeeds, they will erase the New Generation from history and usher in a new era of evil domination over the humans.     The New Generation must travel through time to stop the Time Chojin.    In the process, they earn the distrust of the Legends. The ensuing conflict triggers the start of the 'Ultimate Chojin Tag Tournament', which will pit Legends against New Generation, and Justice Chojin vs Evil Chojin. The winners will determine the future of the planet as we know it and reign supreme over Earth.

title: Full-Time Awakening
author: 绘世TONY
description:
As the captain of the Divine Legion and the strongest Awakener, Bai Yi is betrayed by a comrade, witnessing all his teammates die before his eyes. Only then does he realize he has always been a pawn of those in power. Having lost everything, he is reborn 20 years ago, back to his middle school days before awakening.

At that time, his family and teammates are still alive. To save them, to avenge the betrayer, and to overthrow the entire corrupt ruling system, he embarks on a lonely path of strength.

title: Osananajimi wo Erabenai!
author: Furokawa Tsukasa
description:
For Yu Suzukaze, reuniting with the childhood friend he adored feels like a dream come true. After ten long years apart, they can finally enjoy high school life together. But it turns out, this girl isn’t exactly “single”!

*Source: Manga UP! Global*
___
See also the related [Web Shorts](https://mangadex.org/title/bc53a34e-2771-43f1-b967-9046f4d7b8f1/osananajimi-wo-erabenai) version.

title: Shibou Yuugi de Meshi wo Kuu.
author: Yuuji Ukai
description:
Player Name: Yuki
Age: 17
Profession: Death Games

A huge amount of money, with lives on the line.
Participants? Beautiful girls only.

A deadly showbiz where people die.
These death games are her calling and her reason to live.

For some reason she knows: This is where she belongs.
Elegant. Ruthless.

Cutting through the dazzling gauntlet of death.
Playfully. Desperately.

Aiming for the unprecedented "99 Consecutive Wins"!

title: Adonai
author: Joo Dong-geun
description: You think you know everything about crazy Korean cults? You ain't seen nothing yet.

title: Piccolina
author: Ohtsuki Ichika
description:
Akira, a young yakitori shop owner, has fallen in love with Houka, a bunny girl who often eats at his restaurant. But how can he get close to her when he has to focus on the grill‽ And there are 4 other bunny girls that look just like her‽

**Note:** “Piccolina” is short for “Picco di Stellina”, which means “Starlet Peak” or “Peak of the Starlet” in Italian.

title: Ane no Tomodachi
author: Takase Waka
description:
Hinako, a friend of Asahi's older sister, is a frequent guest at the home of the high school boy. She always misleads his mind with her suggestive attitude while treating him like a little brother... or rather, pet?
___
**Chapters 1 & 2 can be found in the [Pre-Serialization](https://mangadex.org/title/abad18cf-bf72-4bbc-97c8-b55dfa28f9b9/ane-no-yuujin).**

title: Iken Senki Völundio
author: Nanao Nanaki
description:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!

title: Miyu-chan wa Zutto Tomodachi
author: Hideki
description: In the summer of his second year of high school, Yuushin Tahara finds that his childhood friend, Miyu Fukagawa, who had moved away, has returned to the house next door. Although Miyu has grown up to be quite cute, there's something a little strange about her…

title: Slime Seijo
author: Yao Aira
description: The weakest monster (slime) who longed to be human is reincarnated as a saint, but with the worst character of all, a villainous noble girl. From the lowest status, hated and resented; an existence where she will be terminated immediately if her true identity as a slime is discovered, she will become a beloved saint in order to live a safe and secure life!

title: Kuma Kuma Kuma Bear
author: Kumanano
description: Yuna, a 15-year-old girl, started playing the world's first VRMMO. She has earned billions of yen in stocks and confines herself in her house playing the game without going to school. Today, a major update has arrived and she obtained a non-transferable rare bear outfit. But the equipment is so embarrassing that she can't wear it even in the game. Furthermore, when she answers the survey regarding the new update and relaunches the game, she appears in an unknown forest in the bear outfit. Where is this? Email from God? A different world? If she wears the bear outfit she's a cheat, if she takes it off she's a normal girl.

title: Omae Imouto ja Nakute Iinazuke datta no kayo!?
author: Miraijin A
description:
"Humanity, adore thy little sister—." "I wonder when my sister Kana started becoming distant from me—."

Shina Takashi lamented his current days, where being ignored was not uncommon. One day, his parents dropped a shocking revelation. Not only was Takashi not their biological son... but he was also the fiancé of Kana, whom he thought was his sister! From siblings to potential romantic interests, it’s not easy to sort out feelings. The fluctuating emotions, the bewildering distance. Their relationship undergoes an inevitable change—! She's a sister but not a sister!

title: Houkai Gakuen EX - Sakura Arc
author: miHoYo
description:
Houkai Gakuen EX is a special comic introduced in version 2.3 of miHoYo's online game, [Houkai Gakuen 2](https://www.benghuai.com/). [The story also comes with her own MAD version.](https://www.bilibili.com/video/av2645577)  
The story set in Middle age, when black death known as honkai pandemic haunt entire europe. The Schicksal using honkai box to purify outbreak causing the victim turned into honkai beast. Kallen Kaslana decided to steal honkai box and destroyed it but instead she got shot by bullet and stranded upon in land of yamato(known as Japan) in Yae village. After that she was saved by guardian miko in that village named Sakura. This is fateful story between two girls.  
  
(Houkai Gakuen 2 timeline: version 2.3 as World Boss and 4.0 as Limited time Coop Mode)  
(Honkai Impact 3 estimated timeline : Direct Sequel of #Book 1009 and Half Century before #Book 1001)  


---

[# Book 1003 = Mystery of Stigmata](https://mangadex.org/manga/26804/honkai-impact-3rd-mystery-of-stigmata)   
[# Book 1006 = Anti-Enthrophy Invasion](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)

[# Book 1008 = Moon Shadow](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)    


---

Side Story :  
[# Book 1004 = Violet Sea Tales](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)   
**# Book 1005 = Dark Sakura Tales | Guns Girl SchoolDayZ EX - Sakura Arc**   
[# Book 1009 = Purple Kite's Tales](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)

---

Spin-off :  
[# Book 1011 = When Kiana Play Honkai Impact](https://mangadex.org/manga/22297/honkai-impact-3)  
[# Book 1013 = Valkyries' Dining Escapades](https://mangadex.org/manga/26179/honkai-impact-3-valkyries-dining-escapades)  
[# Book 1014 = Summer Memories](https://mangadex.org/title/30931/honkai-impact-3rd-summer-memories)

title: Shāshǒu Shèchù Liàn'ài Shǒucè
author: 雪羊
description: One night, an assassin disguised as a high schooler runs into his drunk neighbor, who plants an unexpected kiss on him. From that moment on, he must keep his secret identity hidden while figuring out how to deal with the “mister” living upstairs.

title: Soretomo Time Leap ni Suru?
author: Hibaru Shunsuke
description:
A lovey-dovey daily life with ara~ ara~ wife who can time leap!

Tokina is a self-proclaimed Timeleaper who loves to pamper her husband, Nobumichi. But today, there's something wrong with Nobumichi! While her husband accepts her sweet behavior without embarrassment, Tokina's flirting gradually escalates...?

title: Nezumi no Hatsukoi
author: Ooseto Riku
description:
Nezumi is a girl who was raised as a hitman by the yakuza and grew up not knowing human love. An ordinary young man, Ao, knows nothing. They fall in love and start to live together, but the evil hand is close at hand...
___
Read the prequel oneshot featuring Messiah-chan's backstory [here](https://mangadex.org/title/a53ff4b3-1514-4b91-9fa0-acd99dd797de/gomennasai-messiah-chan).

title: SHWD
author: sono.N
description: Manga serialization of the doujinshi work with the same name.

title: Gal to Oyasan
author: Yumeno Yuzu
description:
Kotoha is a second-year high school student who puts all her energy into her part-time job, her studies, and her fashion sense. One day, when she returns to her boarding house, she finds out that Itsuki, a university student, is her temporary landlord!? Itsuki is great at cleaning, cooking, and being considerate, but Kotoha can't hide her excitement and confusion at his perfect landlord skills and his doting attitude!

A peaceful battle between an independent-minded honor student gyaru and a naturally charming university student begins.

(Source: Pixiv, translated)

title: Canvas 2 ~Rainbow colored sketch~
author: Kodama Miki
description:
Hiroki was going to be an artist after high school, but has stopped drawing for an unknown reason. He became a teacher at Nadesico Academy, where his cousin, Elis, attends. Then, his childhood friend, Kiri, became a PE teacher at Nadesico who seems to be part of the reason why he stopped drawing….


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **Canvas ~Rainbow Sketch~** (2011)

title: The Spark in Your Eyes
author: Muro
description:
The witch Hildegar, who received the blessing of the Sun Goddess Karia, is known far and wide for her fearsome reputation.  
The Northerner Elkin, who lost his homeland, chases after the witch towards a nameless castle…

title: Futari Bus
author: Toyobayashi Sakane
description:
Shunpei lives in a rural town of barely 3,000 people. Every day, he rides the same bus as his classmate An Takayagawa, the only one who went off to a private middle school. The two haven’t really talked since elementary school... until one day, something gives them a reason to.

A soft, sky-blue not-quite-love comedy, born on a bus for two.

title: Kimi wa Shuumatsu
author: Nakatani Nio
description:
An 'apocalyptic' boy-meets-girl rom-com about high school boy Yutaka Kuromori and the beautiful, popular girl adored by everyone, Aru Hoshina. Yutaka might shyly deny it, insisting “we’re not dating”, but Aru is always clinging to him, and the two are seen as the talk-of-the-school couple.

But behind what looks like an ordinary boy–girl high school relationship lies a secret — one so ruinous and capricious that, if mishandled, it could bring about the end of the world.

title: Destiny Unchain Online ~Kyuuketsu-ki Shoujo to natte, Yagate "Aka no Maou" to Yobareru You ni Narimashita~
author: resn
description:
Mitsuki Kou is such a feared PVP gamer that he's earned the nickname "Crim the Headhunter" in some circles.
His next game to take over? "Destiny Unchain Online", a brand new VRMMO game developed by none other than Kou's father.
But, no new game on release day is without its bugs - namely, Kou glitches to the middle of nowhere, and his vampire avatar is turned into a girl!

title: Zenmetsu End o Shi ni Monogurui de Kaihi shita. Party ga Yanda.
author: Ameito Suzume
description:
**“—N-No!? Wolka, don’t die—!!”**

Wolka is an adventurer reincarnated from Japan. While exploring a dungeon, he and his party are attacked by an overwhelmingly powerful monster. In order to protect his companions, Wolka suffers critical injuries and is pushed to the brink of death.

At that very moment, he finally realizes the truth:
This world is the dark fantasy manga he once read in his previous life—and he himself is nothing more than a background character, fated to die along with the rest of the party.

Hating bad endings more than anything else, Wolka refuses to accept that fate. Driven by sheer desperation, he fights with everything he has and, against all odds, miraculously defeats the monster. Though he loses one eye and one leg in the process, Wolka feels relieved for having overturned the “party annihilation” ending that was supposed to await him.

But his troubles are far from over.

Since that incident, the girls in his party begin to change.
Their gazes grow unbearably heavy.
Their words become increasingly dangerous.

“I’ll protect you this time, so please don’t leave me...”
“I’ll always stay by your side, senior—okay?”
“I’ve already decided... if it’s for your sake, I’m ready to die.”



This is an isekai story about a reincarnator who believes in absolute happy endings—and the girls who harbor overwhelmingly obsessive feelings toward him.
A darkly emotional otherworld tale themed around 【Emotional Descent】, where the survival he fought so desperately to achieve becomes the very beginning of emotional darkness.

title: Nyoro Nyoro
author: Koonita Birako
description:
A slightly bizarre, and crazy fantasy world!?

Nyororin, a girl with a snake-like body, lives with her otherworldly father, snake mother, and snake-like younger brother.

Her daily life with her slightly strange friends is eccentric and unpredictable!?

A slightly dark, and slightly gentle, new sensational manga!

title: Ryuu: Ron
author: Murakami Motoka
description:
Kyouto, April 1928. Oshikouji Ryu is 17 years old, and is called 'Genius swordman, Dragon of Kyouto'. He will inherit the property of the noble Oshikouji family, but prefers practising Kendou. He enters a school for training Kendou swordman, but the seniors of school are very harsh and intolerable. But Ryu doesn't surrender and overcomes the problems, later on he impresses his seniors and they begin to like him.

This manga tells a great story against the richly textured background of historical Japan and China, it has a refined and excellent artwork. Murakami's views on Chinese and Korean people is very warm, and not those of the previous invader and governor such as the extreme right party in Japan. Another interesting part of the manga is its rich depiction of Japanese colorful life. A typical example of the realistic style and a manga of high reputation in Korea and Japan.

title: Shimokita Glory Days
author: Otani Jiro
description:
Yuta, a ronin student, moves to Tokyo wishing to enter the university. With no money, he'll move into a share house filled with beautiful women...

You might know this manga from [the drama that stars gravure models and AV actresses](https://asianwiki.com/Shimokita_GLORY_DAYS).

title: Kekkon Suru tte, Hontou desu ka: 365 Days To The Wedding
author: Wakaki Tamiki
description: Takuya and Rika are co-workers for a travel agency and have barely ever interacted as they are both introverted, anti-social people. Both are doing their jobs as normal when an announcement from the higher-ups comes down: in one year, an overseas branch will be opening in Siberia, and an employee from their location will be sent to work there! While there's no telling who will be chosen to go, it is explained that people who are married and have families are far less likely to be sent! Neither Takuya nor Rika want to go to Siberia! Desperate to protect their solitary lives, they develop a plan: pretend that they are getting married to each other! Will they be able to keep up this charade for 365 days, and, maybe, even fall for one another in that time?

title: Mori no Asagao - Shinjin Keimukan to Aru Shikeishuu no Monogatari
author: Gouda Mamora
description:
A work which highlights the “present” of the capital punishment system through Oikawa Naoki, a newly recruited prison officer, who faces condemned criminals everyday and agonizes. Based on close and careful research, the author tackles with the serious theme of the “capital punishment system” head-on.

Won the 11th Japan Media Arts Festival Grand Prize for Manga.

title: Isekai de Mizu no Dai Seirei Yattemasu
author: Hotaka Inaho
description: When the laid-back high school student Saejima Nagi wakes up from a nap, he finds himself in a lake in another world!? After learning that he is the "Great Water Spirit" whose essence is the lake, Nagi uses the power that resides within him to heal those suffering from injuries and illnesses. One day, Nagi is led by a voice calling for help and is summoned by a boy. This encounter will greatly change Nagi's fate...

title: Umapaka Manga Gekijou
author: Overall (Circle)
description: The slapstick days between Trainer and his Uma Musume.

title: Kimi ni Sasayaku
author: Megurumiru
description:
If you were to experience an "auditory hallucination" in which the voice of an ASMR streamer you’re used to hearing seems to whisper right in your ear, would it be real?
The silent fantasy begins — a whispering voice guiding me!

title: Samurai Troopers
author: Hoshino Ryuichi
description: Talpa(Arago), the demon lord of the Netherworld, is bent on conquering the mortal world. Standing against Talpa and his four Dark Warlords(Mashou) are the five Ronin Warriors, each in possession of mystical armor and weapons. They are assisted by Mia Koji(Nasty Yagyu), a young student-teacher, and a mysterious warrior-monk known only as The Ancient (Kaosu).

title: Fly Over the Sea
author: 聚能画工作室
description:
Ji Chi, the young master of a gang, was betrayed and murdered by his fiancé. He was then transmigrated 30 years in the past into the body of a 19-year-old. Here, the Alpha was saved by a kindhearted and gentle Beta during a time of desperation. However, the person who he thought was an angelic savior, had the exact same face as the murderer who killed him in his previous life...

Merciless, younger, bad boy Alpha X Intelligent, soft boy, older, doctor Beta

title: Buried Injustice
author: 茜茜sato
description: Xue Zhao came looking for a missing woman in Chenjia Village. However, he learns that the village answers to a cult devoted to a forgotten Gu deity. Xue Zhao then tries to escape with his companions, but he soon realizes that there are even more terrifying, hidden secrets within the village. These unknown horrors go far beyond anything he could have imagined...

title: Sotsugyou Album no Kanojotachi
author: Mikawa Ghost
description:
"A love that was supposed to be just a memory starts moving all at once!!"

Kanae Meguru, a movie enthusiast, had potential romantic interests throughout elementary, middle, and high school. However, due to his lack of experience in love, he was never able to take action. Learning from that, he vowed to focus entirely on his university film club activities, completely ignoring romance. But that resolve was short-lived—before he knew it, he found himself falling for Ootsuka Ozora, a girl he met in the film club...!?

title: Shichi Genme wa Ninja Shugyou Desu!
author: MIGCHIP
description:
Shino Hattori, a sheltered young lady from Iga City, never fits in at school. She thinks making friends is just a waste of time, so she spends each day alone—until she finds a strange coded note in her desk:
“Meet me behind the gym after class.”
Curious despite herself, Shino goes…and meets Kanna Ueno, a girl who wants to become a ninja.
Kanna insists they do “ninja training” together—basically ninja pretend play—but Shino immediately refuses.
But Kanna won’t take no for an answer. Armed with her “ninjutsu” (or something like it), she drags Shino into a whirlwind of trouble…!?

---
[Alternate Raw (ComicWalker)](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_007122_S/)

title: For Each Retweet, Two Straight Girls Who Don't Get Along Will Kiss for One Second
author: Fukuroumori
description: Two straight girls who don't get along will kiss 1 second for every 1 retweet

title: Space Cheon-ma 3077
author: Sanha (산하)
description: Qi, swords, martial artists… and robots and spaceships?! The year is 3077, thousands of years after the heyday of the martial arts realm. Humanity inhabits the stars, governed by interstellar martial arts organizations who kept the old ways of the realm alive: might makes right! For bounty hunters like Seryeong, Robert, and Sunja, this means trouble is good for business, except when they bite off more than they can chew. After venturing to the irradiated wasteland of Earth for a top bounty, only to find a 2,000-year-old martial artist instead, they realize their fortunes are about to change…

title: GTO: Great Teacher Onizuka
author: Fujisawa Tohru
description:
Meet Eikichi Onizuka, a 22-year-old ex-biker. He's crude, foul-mouthed, and has a split-second temper. His unlikely goal: to be the Greatest High School Teacher in the World! Of course, the only reason he wants to be a teacher is so he can try to score with the hot students…  
Before he can become a full instructor, he's got to work as a student teacher to earn his credentials. Onizuka may think he's the toughest guy on campus, but when he meets his class full of bullies, blackmailers, and scheming sadists, he'll have to prove it.  
  
---
- **Won the 22nd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen**

title: Bobobo-bo Bo-bobo
author: Sawai Yoshio
description:
In the year 300X, a cruel dictator has mandated the hunting of all hair in the Chrome Dome Empire. But a single man rises to the occasion and takes a stand against this violation of human hair rights. Bo-bobo, master of the Fist of the Nose Hair, uses the prehensile hairs of his schnoz to most lethal ends. Follow the nonsensical adventures of Bo-bobo and his sentient sidekick snacks as they lead their hilarious rebellion against the Empire.

A parody of the very popular Fist of the North Star (Hokuto no Ken), as well as other Jump manga.

[Official English*](https://www.viz.com/bobobo-bo-bo-bobo)
  ***Only 5 Volumes of the manga were translated. Instead of starting at the beginning, Viz instead released the content that coincided with the later parts of the Anime adaptation.**
        
   **A special single tankoban containing chapters from the Hallelujah Land Arc (Holy Guacamole Land for the dub) was also released, but has since not been reprinted nor is it featured anywhere on the Viz page.**
    
**What were volumes 11-15 of the manga were counted as 1-5 when Viz released them in English. As of October 5, 2010, Viz has not released any additional content, nor have they made any comments regarding Bo-Bo-Bo since then.**

title: Net no "Oshi" to Real no "Oshi" ga Tonari ni Hikkoshite Kita
author: Haruka Touko
description:
**The only one who can support them is... me?**

Tendou Souma, who spends his days in idle monotony, has two "idols." His online idol is Henrietta, a hugely popular VTuber. His real-life idol is Hiyori Yatsumi, an idol and voice actress. Souma's university life was supposed to be centered around supporting these two idols... But then, one of his idols unexpectedly moves into the room next door!? Excited by this dream-like turn of events, Soma is thrilled, but what he discovers is the disappointing true nature of his idol...

title: Kimi no Love wo Misetekure!
author: Rimukoro
description: Komichi Shijou, the most famous person at her school, was troubled. Despite being a romantic comedy manga artist, she had no understanding of "the feeling of love" was stuck in a creative slump. One day, a certain boy and girl appear before her.

title: Chiseigaku Boys ~Koku ga Salaryman ni natte Hataraku Kaisha~
author: Rio (理央)
description: Geopolitics is a hot topic of study that looks at a country's politics and economy from the aspect of geography. Japan is a country with a lot of boys from the U.S., China, Russia, and other countries who work too hard for their own good, and who are in the dark.

title: Yachiru-san wa Homeru to Nobiru
author: Toono Hitonatsu
description:
Yachiru is a hasshakusama youkai living in the human world. Because the prevailing public image of hasshakusama is that they're lewd, her powers have weakened and her height has shrunk from its original 8 shaku (240 cm) to about 190 cm. She strives to correct that impression, but each day is another failure. However, while at the cinema to study horror films, she meets Seiichirou, a young man who is a huge fan of hasshakusama. That's when Yachiru realizes that whenever Seiichirou praises her, her height returns to its original size...!!!
___

  - [YanMaga Web](https://yanmaga.jp/comics/%E3%82%84%E3%81%A1%E3%82%8B%E3%81%95%E3%82%93%E3%81%AF%E3%81%BB%E3%82%81%E3%82%8B%E3%81%A8%E3%81%AE%E3%81%B3%E3%82%8B)
- [Official X](https://x.com/yachirusanha)

title: Kurokami Seiso no Reikoku Bishoujo o Tasuketara, Ore to Futarikiri no Toki dake Dereru You ni Natta Ken
author: Purapura
description: At Seiryo High School, where second-year student Minato Ichijo attends, there is a girl known as the “Cold Princess.” Her name is Rei Nanase. With her stunning beauty and exceptional talents, many admire her—yet she rejects all advances with an icy attitude. Minato, however, has little interest in romance due to personal reasons. Even though Rei sits next to him in class and works part-time at the same café, he pays her no special attention. One day, Minato stumbles upon Rei in a back alley, quarreling with a persistent man he recognizes as a customer who had been turned down by her at the café. Acting on impulse, he steps in to help. The very next day after work, Rei unexpectedly appears in the staff room—despite not being scheduled—and suddenly demands a kiss from Minato… Thus begins Minato’s bewildering days, swept up by a slightly offbeat kuudere young lady.

title: Drawing - Saikyou Mangaka wa Oekaki Skill de Isekai Musou Suru!
author: Im Dal-Young
description:
Akira Kamishiro was a very successful manga author, who was diagnosed with blood cancer one day. He regretted the way he lived, where he could only build up empty relationships. Angry at his mother for asking him to send her some money, he died in a car accident. He was given a chance to choose his new mother and reincarnate in another world.

Akira, not wanting to have a repeat of his past life, decided to choose an ordinary but safe life. He was reincarnated as Akira, the only son of a magic store, with his previous life's memories. He had no talent for swordsmanship or magic, but he didn’t care as he was still loved by his family. At one point, he realized that he can embody various things by "drawing a picture". That's when he noticed his cheat ability...!?

title: Bocchi the Rock!
author: Hamaji Aki
description: Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. However her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a drummer girl looking for a new guitarist for her band.

title: Dai-3 no Gideon
author: Nogizaka Tarou
description: The stage is the eve of the French Revolution. There is the commoner Gideon, who wants to save the impoverished country side-by-side with the members of the Estates General. Then there is the aristocrat, Georges, who will use any means to achieve his purpose. A man who wants to change the country, and a man who wants to destroy it. Both begin their journey forward. Will their joint efforts of love and hatred, justice and evil lead them to a hell of bloodshed, or an ideal future?

title: Guide Hunting
author: Hong Cha
description:
[Translated by Mosh Scans]
Insane Tyrannical Sentinel x Two-faced Green Tea Guide
.
Bo Zeluo is Yisha's Kingdom most powerful Prince, but while on a mission he suffers a serious injury that turns him into a useless Butterfly.
In order to get back everything he lost, he searches everywhere for a Guide able to heal him. A-Level Guide, He Lanyu, in order to use him to get vengeance, purposely appears next to him as prey during one of the Prince's hunting sessions.
The two don't trust each other, but the attraction between them is undeniable.
Their suspicion brings hunter and prey to test each other constantly, pushing one another to their very limit...

title: Nìng Jià Páiwèi Bù Dāng Qiè
author: 班克西
description:
My cousin and I were engaged at the same time. She was engaged to the heir to the duke's house, and I was engaged to the second son.
But the eldest son died in battle, and the second son has now become the heir. To escape her reputation as a husband-killer, my cousin turned to my fiancé.
On the eve of our wedding, my fiancé decided to take her as his first wife and me as his concubine.
Everyone thought I would either swallow my pride or defiantly refuse this union. Instead, I declared, "I will marry the deceased young master instead."
Become a concubine? No!
I'd rather marry a spirit tablet.

title: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray
author: Itou Junnousuke
description: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.

title: Misato-san wa Amasugi Joushi ni Chotto Kibishii
author: Kurotama
description:
Misato-san, a very beautiful office lady who is good at her job, and her boss—Konishikawa-san, a middle-aged man who spoils his subordinates. Misato-san has a strict attitude toward Konishikawa-san, but what are the hidden feelings behind it?! The gap between the seriousness and cuteness will make you faint in anxiety, and this office love comedy with a difference in age begins! (MTL)
___
**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw](https://shukanmanga.jp/work_list/detail/misatosan)

title: Detective Conan
author: Gosho Aoyama
description: Shinichi Kudo is a high school detective who sometimes works with the police to solve cases. During an investigation, he is attacked by members of a crime syndicate known as the Black Organization. They force him to ingest an experimental poison, but instead of killing him, the poison transforms him into a child. Adopting the pseudonym Conan Edogawa and keeping his true identity a secret, Kudo lives with his childhood friend Ran and her father Kogoro, who is a private detective.

title: Itoko no Ko
author: Inuchiku
description:
His more-than-friends, less-than-lovers cousin is so cute that he could die!!!!? 

Nozomu is a boy staying at his uncle's house over summer vacation. In the countryside, where there are no convenience stores, or any busses even, the boy has a problem. That problem is his younger cousin, Sou! He's being led around by this tanned, energetic girl day after day and can't show her the dignity befitting his older age! On top of that, whether intentional or not, he’s getting flustered by Sou's inviting demeanor. Eventually, Nozomu couldn't take his eyes off Sou and is falling more and more under her spell...!!? With a "cousin" like this, his reason is having a hard time hanging on!
___
**Additional Links:**
